We have many great technical events like GAT, RAT, LFR, RoboRumble and many more that will surely ignite the engineer in you! Take out those Arduinos! Get building ! Compete with your friends and find out if your robot is the last one standing!
The five departments of NITM - CSE, ECE, EEE, ME and CE have in store for a wide range of interesting events that are both challenging and fun.
To NIT Meghalaya\'s Annual Tech Fest COGNITIA 2018
Brace yourself to get a feel of Meghalaya\'s largest tech fest
